creator.name: Notarisambt in Berbice
creator.his_func: There was no public notary in Berbice. Therefore, the secretaries or the sworn clerks of the colony exercised the work of a notary and took the instruments, such as last will and testaments, inventories, loans and deeds of procuration. Certain types of deeds, like deeds of conveyance of real estate and mortgage deeds were drawn up by the Governor and his Councillors.
creator.Aantekeningen:
